strengths: Devour — capture opponent non-structure units destroyed in combat
Amalgamation — produce captured unit types without spending resources
Riftmeld — use captured units to bypass tech prerequisites
Dimensional Tears under space docks create gravity rifts only you move freely through
Psychological pressure — opponents fear losing ships to your capture mechanic
weaknesses: Limited starting expansion — 1 space dock, modest units
Fixed production limit of 5 per dock (not planet value +2)
Success relies on accumulating captured units — poor combat luck is devastating
If opponents blockade a space dock, you must return all captured units from that dock
tips: Focus on early combat engagements to start capturing opponent units
Establish multiple Dimensional Tears to unlock Commander (requires units in 3 gravity rifts)
Use Riftmeld to convert captured units into tech prerequisites — enormous efficiency gain
Dimensional Tear II is a key upgrade for production and rift expansion
Protect space docks from blockade — losing captured units is catastrophic
The psychological threat of capture is as valuable as the actual mechanic

techPaths.name: Combat-acquired via Riftmeld
techPaths.note: Use Riftmeld to bypass prerequisites; prioritize unit upgrades. Dimensional Tear II is essential.
